google_play_reviews.content: ***please consider the ability to have in chat/conversation notification sound. A sound while you're chatting and you receive a message. Great app. Easy to get started, and works! Love that it works perfectly without google (play services/cloud messaging). It does use a bit more battery than I'd like. The two biggest things: better battery usage and in chat/convo notification sounds. Thank you for everything you guys are doing. Keep it up
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you very much!
Battery and traffic usage is a priority, and the recent server updates should have reduced it - we'd love to hear if you can see the difference.
It is possible now to send files and images; audio/video calls are already available as an experimental feature - you can enable via the settings.

google_play_reviews.content: The best system for private chatting! Easy to use and also very good! This is world changing.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much! Bring your friends, it helps a lot! And send your ideas via chat!

google_play_reviews.content: Always a fan of open source software. Keep up the good work
It's would be great if you add more option like some members can only watch group but with sending messages limitation ( admin can limit some members from sending message )
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you - great idea! Things like that are definitely coming with large groups support next year!

google_play_reviews.content: SimpleX is a good choice for a private and secure messaging solution. I am excited to see where SimpleX goes from here.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! We're planning large groups, public channels, large file support coming early next year, and optional user addresses linked to emails are coming next year too.

google_play_reviews.content: Hello, it is not possible to cut images and videos when sending. Videos don't play in the app when sent, voice calls are also glitchy. The messages that we delete bilaterally can be seen again with the reveal option, and this is a problem because the sender of the message is sure of his decision that he deleted the message bilaterally.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you! Images can only be edited outside of the app for now, but we may change it next year. Voice calls are indeed terrible for many users, but work well for some others - we will make them work next year. Re deletion - you can now allow your contacts (and your contacts can allow you) deleting messages irreversibly.
Thank you. Send us any suggestions in the chat. We know that battery consumption is suboptimal and will be improving - how is it working for you?

google_play_reviews.content: This app has a lot of potential and I like it's anonymity Things that could be competitive A lot of phones don't give user a notification unless the user opens the app I'm able to screenshot the conversation which can be something of concern
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! Version 4.3 allows users to disable screenshot. We made it optional, as it's primarily done to hide the app in the recent apps, and the senders should not rely on it anyway – the photograph can be made with another device...

google_play_reviews.content: I expect this project in the future to be different from most messaging apps, with security and privacy that surpasses others.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! Yes, we are indeed aiming to raise the bar!
